content.rendered: Nandita Koshal, Senior Portfolio Manager at Millennium, believes that people don’t recognize the creativity that lies at the heart of the investment process. She reflects on the aspects of her job that energize and excite her.

excerpt.rendered: Nandita Koshal, Senior Portfolio Manager at Millennium, believes that people don’t recognize the creativity that lies at the heart of the investment process. She reflects on the aspects of her job that energize and excite her.
